attributes.action: Delay GCSE EXAMS as a result of fasting students in the month of Ramadan
attributes.additional_details: This opportunity will increase the chance of higher grades and also a higher chance of extra revision for the whole country.
attributes.background:
Many Muslim student will be fasting during their most important exam in their life's.
Extending the exam dates will give chances for the whole country to have more revision time.

rejection.details: Decisions about the dates of exams are taken by exam boards, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
